item.title: Anger as MSF agrees to Israel’s ‘unreasonable demands’: What to know - Al Jazeera
item.description: Anger as MSF agrees to Israel’s ‘unreasonable demands’: What to know Al JazeeraIsrael is trying to evict Doctors Without Borders from Gaza Le Monde.frMSF statement on staff registration and the continuation of medical care in the Occupied Palestinian Territory Doctors Without BordersDoctors Without Borders’ NYT promotion against Israel jpost.com"Doctors Without Borders" Accepts Israeli Conditions to Continue Operations in Gaza yaffap…

item.title: Israel says it has retrieved remains of final Gaza hostage
item.description: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu called Ran Gvili’s return “an extraordinary achievement”.

item.title: Anger as MSF agrees to Israel’s ‘unreasonable demands’: What to know
item.description: Medical charity will hand over details of its Palestinian staff to Israel, which targeted aid workers during genocide.

item.title: Israel confirms recovery of last hostage's remains from Gaza
item.description: The remains of Ran Gvili, the final Israeli hostage held by Hamas, have been recovered from Gaza. The police officer died defending Israel on Oct. 7.

item.title: Remains of last Israeli captive Ran Gvili recovered from Gaza, says Israel
item.description: Retrieval of Gvili's body could pave the way for next phase of the ceasefire, including reopening the Rafah crossing.

item.title: Israel announces limited reopening of Rafah Crossing under Trump’s 20-point plan
item.description: Netanyahu agrees to reopen Gaza's Rafah crossing under President Trump's 20-point peace plan, pending the recovery of the final Israeli hostage.
